text: Alexander Popov () is a 1949 Soviet drama movie directed by Herbert Rappaport and Viktor Eisymont.От блокады до «Варяга». Лучшие фильмы режиссера Виктора ЭйсымонтаАлександр Попов (1949) It stars Nikolay Cherkasov, Aleksandr Borisov, and Konstantin Skorobogatov. ==Actors== * Nikolay Cherkasov as Aleksandr Stepanovich Popov * Aleksandr Borisov as Rybkin * Konstantin Skorobogatov as Admiral Makarov * Ilya Sudakov as Mendeleyev * Yuriy Tolubeev as Petrushevsky == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1949 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Herbert Rappaport Category:Movies directed by Viktor Eisymont
title: Alexander Popov (movie)
